copy: I'm always experimenting.  Here are some things I've got in the works.

unordered-list.name: layout garden
unordered-list.description: Digging into CSS with both heels.

unordered-list.name: exercises for programmers
unordered-list.description: PHP and JavaScript applications written to solve problems from Brian Hogan's practice book.

unordered-list.description: Repositories for past and present projects.

unordered-list.name: codepens
unordered-list.description: Little experiments with CSS and Javascript. I'm currently digging into CSS Grid and animations with CSS, Javascript, and SVGs.
